title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 350.3 - Objectives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 350.3 - Objectives

State Regulations

The objective of the investigation and report is to
provide the court with relevant and reliable information, in a succinct, analytical presentation for decision-making. Also, to provide dispositional and
regulatory agencies that are entitled to access with information for immediate
and future decision-making purposes with respect to placement/incarceration, services and program delivery. These dispositional agencies shall include
probation, social services, New York State Office of Children and Family

Services (OCFS), Department of Corrections and Community Supervision (DOCCS), and any other public institution or agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
350.3

Amended

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
